index.title: InkTemplate - Free templates for print
index.description: Print it yourself! Free printable templates for your invitation, place cards, name tags and menus. Design for all events like wedding, birthdays, or work events.

savethedate.title: InkTemplate - Save the Date
savethedate.description: Create an save the date card to make sure your guest can attend your wedding, birthday, party or social gathering. Make sure they want to the date!
